</td><td>

[ItemOffsetMapping](./react-virtual-scroll.itemoffsetmapping.md)


</td><td>

Implementation of [ItemOffsetMapping](./react-virtual-scroll.itemoffsetmapping.md) interface that defines size and offset to each item in the list

Use [useFixedSizeItemOffsetMapping()](./react-virtual-scroll.usefixedsizeitemoffsetmapping.md) or [useVariableSizeItemOffsetMapping()](./react-virtual-scroll.usevariablesizeitemoffsetmapping.md) to create implementations for common cases.


</td></tr>
